title.text: Office XP Service Pack 3 for Multilingual User Interface Pack

description.text: Office XP Service Pack 3 for Multilingual User Interface Pack ensures that Office XP Service Pack 3 performs with complete functionality when you use an Office XP Multilingual User Interface Pack. This service pack applies to any level of Office XP Multilingual User Interface Pack. It contains all updates included in SP1 and SP2, in addition to updates released after SP2.
